def_en: Modern means relating to the present time, for example the present decade or present century.

def_cn: 现代化的;新式的;最新的
def_en: Something that is modern is new and involves the latest ideas or equipment.
People are sometimes described as modern when they have opinions or ways of behaviour that have not yet been accepted by most people in a society.

def_cn: (艺术、舞蹈、音乐、建筑的风格)现代的，近代的
def_en: Modern is used to describe styles of art, dance, music, and architecture that have developed in recent times, in contrast to classical styles.
